locutie.beschrijving: The sermon explores the tension between systemic violence and prophetic vision, drawing parallels between Habakkuk's context and contemporary society, culminating in the story of Zacchaeus.
locutie.exegetische_kwaliteit: High. The preacher connects the Hebrew 'hamas' (violence) with the socio-political reality of both the 7th century BCE and the present day.

illocutie.beschrijving: Primarily asserting and describing the nature of 'vision' as a theological category, with a shift toward directive imagining at the end.
voorbeelden: It is the business of the prophet to offer a vision.
Faith is confidence that the vision will prevail.
I will tell you who you really are.

perlocutie.beoogd_effect: To inspire hope and ethical imagination (defiance of violence) in the hearer.
perlocutie.pneumatologisch_bewustzijn: Minimal. Mentioned once regarding Zacchaeus ('force of the spirit'), but not as the agent of the sermon's efficacy.

voorbeelden: He lived in the decades just before the destruction.
It is always a contest between violence and vision.
God has got us all in his hands.
commissieven.kwaliteit: Weak. The promises are mostly described as historical categories rather than currently enacted bonds.

voorbeelden: I will tell you who you really are.
That same vision is uttered in the gospel for us.
declaratieven.autoriteit: Moderate. The preacher quotes Jesus' declaration to Zacchaeus but hesitates to speak 'in persona Christi' to the congregation.

constatief_surplus_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: The hearer becomes an observer of a 'vision' rather than a participant in a 'event'.

missende_elementen: Direct promise of grace to the specific 'you' in the pews

toezegging_check.kwaliteit_toezeggen: Indirect. The promise is 'uttered in the gospel' rather than 'uttered by the preacher now'.
voorbeelden: It gives us a new identity.

tweede_persoon.gebruik: Limited. Used mostly in the imperatives at the end.

derde_persoon.gebruik: Dominant. Talking about Habakkuk, Zacchaeus, and 'the church'.

verleden_tijd.gebruik: Biblical history and Le Chambon example.

voorbeelden: The future is with God... So it seems to me... First, they envision.
foutief_patroon.probleem: The 'ought' (Directive) is not sufficiently preceded by the 'is-given' (Commissive).

voorbeelden_goede_verhouding: Today salvation has come... Zacchaeus responded.
voorbeelden_slechte_verhouding: Our work is to fill out the vision... imagine a new economy.

diagnostische_evaluatie.diagnose_toelichting: The sermon is a brilliant sociopolitical and theological lecture on the concept of 'vision,' but it remains largely constative. It talks *about* the vision rather than *bestowing* the vision.

zwakke_punten.probleem: The preacher remains a commentator rather than a herald.

diagnostische_evaluatie.gebeuren_toelichting: It is an event of 'learning,' but not necessarily a sacramental encounter where God's word creates a new reality in the moment.
diagnostische_evaluatie.sacramentele_toelichting: Lacks the 'Toezegging' (Promise) that binds God to the hearer here and now.

openbaringsleer.god_als_spreker: God is described as having spoken in the past.
openbaringsleer.prediker_als_mandataris: Preacher acts as an analyst of the Word, not a mandatory.
tekstueel_bewijs: It is the business of the prophet to offer a vision.

pneumatologie.perlocutie_theologie: The effect is sought through 'imagining' (cognitive) rather than the Spirit's work.
tekstueel_bewijs: Your body is loaded with the force of the spirit.

sacramentstheologie.preek_als_genademiddel: The sermon is treated as an 'alternative way' (ethical) rather than a 'means of grace'.
tekstueel_bewijs: Such visioning action is in our baptismal DNA.

aanbevelingen.werkwoord_audit_samenvatting: Too many 'is' and 'was' verbs; needs more 'I promise' and 'You are' verbs.

specifieke_suggesties.huidige_formulering: That same vision is uttered in the gospel for us.
specifieke_suggesties.voorgestelde_revisie: Today, in the name of Christ, I declare this vision to you: you are a child of the promise.
specifieke_suggesties.verschil: Shifts from a report about the gospel to the enactment of the gospel.

toezegging_versterking.probleem: The grace is kept at a distance in the story of Zacchaeus.
voorbeeldzinnen: God says to you today: I must stay at your house.

adressering_verbetering.suggestie: Use 'You' for the promise and 'I' for the proclamation.
voorbeeldzinnen: You do not have to live in fear anymore.

indicatief_imperatief_herstel.probleem: The 'imagining' feels like a new law/work.
indicatief_imperatief_herstel.suggestie: Ground the 'imagining' in the fact that Christ has already opened the future.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: Theologically rich and socially poignant, but needs to move from 'talking about vision' to 'performing the vision' to become a truly sacramental event.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_schulz_von_thun: SvT would focus on the preacher's 'self-revelation' or 'appeal'; SAT reveals the sermon lacks the 'Declarative' power of a divine mandate.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retoriek: Rhetorically, the sermon is excellent (metaphors, structure). SAT reveals it is illocutionarily weak (it doesn't 'do' what it 'says').
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_SAT: SAT exposes that 'Vision' is treated as a Constative object rather than a Performative encounter.

kernzinnen_analyse.zin: I will tell you who you really are.
kernzinnen_analyse.effectiviteit: High - this is the most performative moment in the sermon.

appendices.notities: The sermon relies heavily on the 'illustrative' power of the Zacchaeus story rather than the 'proclamatory' power of the pulpit.
